actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dragon makes one Bite attack and one Claw attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 8 (1d10+3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 6 (1d6+3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Acid Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The dragon exhales acid in a 15-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 11 DEX save, taking 22 (5d8) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: The black dragon can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Pounce
special_abilities.desc: If the dragon moves at least 15 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a Claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 13 STR save or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the dragon can make one Claw attack against it as a bonus action.
